package.description: hector_worldmodel_msgs is a message package to comes with the hector_worldmodel stack. The messages can be used to send percepts from images (hector_worldmodel_msgs/ImagePercept) or other sources (hector_worldmodel_msgs/PosePercept) to the hector_object_tracker node. The tracker publishes model updates as hector_worldmodel_msgs/Object messages and latches the whole model state as a hector_worldmodel_msgs/ObjectModel message.
